xwikidoc.name: How do I report a bug
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.DeanWay
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: How do I report a bug

object.name: FAQ.How do I report a bug

property.answer:
You can report a problem you are having with any PhenoTips software by sending an email to [[mailto:support@phenotips.org]], or by posting an issue on our [[GitHub page>>https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues]].
If you have any software development experience and wish to contribute to PhenoTips by fixing the bug yourself, PhenoTips is an open-source project and your help is welcome. Please refer to our [[Developer Guide>>DevGuide.WebHome]] and make sure to read the section on [[Contributing>>DevGuide.Contributing]].
